replies.body:
This might be bad,but I used to use "hacks" without even knowing I had em'

I had macro key binds for chat messages and for commands like /join

I had inventory tweaks

And I had auto tool switch

This seams like I didn't bother reading the rules (Which was true at the time :/) because I wasn't part of the community  ack then and I was part of another community.

This was back in 1.6 when I used a OP mod pack that I thought weren't hacks.

The good part is that I learned that does we're hacks in the 1.7 update so uninstalled them.

Ill never use those hacks again.

replies.body:
Guess it's time to confess..
I used to play Walls a lot before I joined the MCZone forums. I had an xray texture pack my friend installed that I was only going to use in SSP, but I accidentally kept it on when I played Walls again.
I was still new to MC and everything, and I didn't know this stuff was illegal, before I uninstalled it for good.
I knew where all the chests, caves, ores, and players were. I won that match, and kept on using it.

It's uninstalled now, but I feel guilty for not being caught and winning "illegally."
replies.body_tagged:
